TopicTitle: crash at soi change, Galileo planet pack

Articles.Content:
pretty much the game freezes up at soi entry of either of gaels moons. Tried to follow info in this thread to fix but did not work (removed GPP_TerrainDetailPreset.cfg and settings.cfg)  https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/177741-crashing-at-soi-change/

have something like 107 mods so clean install isn't really preferred 

any help is appreciated

additional info and log

ksp 1.6 64bit directx11

mods:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/6rdue4bbylmmewx/2019-03-06 20_50_03-Greenshot.png?dl=0

log:
